title: Back Dated
description: Ray Flaxman's future just caught up with him, and it could prove fatal.Sci-fi writer Ray Flaxman has a jealous fianc√©e, a secret admirer and a deadline to meet. He doesn't need any more trouble, but then a strange young woman turns up at his is she his secret admirer, an obsessed fan, or a blackmailer? The truth is even more startling and a lot more dangerous. Ray is forced to emulate the hero of his novels in order to ensure, not just his own survival, but that of the male half of the human race.
author: Chris Niblock
